dc_title_s: Petroleum Reservoir Fields (Oil and Gas): Indiana
dc_description_s: PETROLEUM_FIELDS_IGS_IN.SHP is an Esri polygon shapefile that depicts the locations and extents of all petroleum reservoir fields in Indiana, as of January 8, 2015. PETROLEUM_FIELDS_IGS_IN.SHP shows boundaries of petroleum reservoir fields that enclose petroleum wells that are classified as producing from a single field, but does not necessarily indicate the maximum extent of the producing reservoir field.
